verses.verse: Masters, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3930>give<s%> unto your <S%G1401>servants<s%> that which is <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2471>equal;<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2962>Master<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

Withal <S%G260><s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> would <S%G455>open<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G3056>utterance,<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I am also in <S%G1210>bonds:<s%> <S%G2532><s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> I may make it <S%G5319>manifest,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

Let <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%> be <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G741>seasoned<s%> with <S%G217>salt,<s%> that ye may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G611>answer<s%> every <S%G1520>man.<s%> <S%G1538><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> my <S%G2596>state<s%> <S%G1691><s%> shall <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> <S%G1107>declare<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> who is a <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fellow <S%G4889>servant<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the same <S%G846>purpose,<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G1097>know<s%> your <S%G4012>estate,<s%> <S%G5216><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts;<s%>

With <S%G4862><s%> <S%G3682>Onesimus,<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%> They shall make <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> which are done <S%G5602>here.<s%>

Aristarchus <S%G708><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> fellow <S%G4869>prisoner<s%> <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3138>Mark,<s%> sister's <S%G431>son<s%> to <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G4012>(touching<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1785>commandments:<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G846>him;)<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> which is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2459>Justus,<s%> who <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> are my fellow <S%G4904>workers<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> have <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G3931>comfort<s%> unto <S%G3427>me.<s%>

Epaphras, <S%G1889><s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> laboring <S%G75>fervently<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4335>prayers,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4137>complete<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I bear him <S%G3140>record,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G2205>zeal<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2993>Laodicea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2404>Hierapolis.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> this <S%G1992>epistle<s%> is <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it be <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2994>Laodiceans;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> epistle <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2993>Laodicea.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> to <S%G751>Archippus,<s%> Take <S%G991>heed<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou <S%G4137>fulfill<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>
